_gram:
({#krAmati, kramate#},
{#krAmyati, cakrAma, cakrame, akramIt, akraMsta, krAMta#})
_meanings:
{@--2@} To go to, approach (with acc).;
{#devA imAn lokAnakramaMta#} <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>

{@--4@} To leap, jump; {#kramaM babaMDa#}
{#kramituM sakopaH#} ({#hariH#}) <ls>Bk. 2. 9.</ls> <ls n="Bk.">5. 51.</ls>

{@--11@} To be
repeated (as a letter or word in the
arrangement called {#krama#} <ab>q. v.</ab>).

{@--13@} To have
sexual intercourse with. (By 
<ls>P. I. 3. 38</ls> {#kram#} by itself is used in the
<ab>Atm.</ab> in the sense of ‘continuity’ or
‘want of interruption,’ ‘energy or
application’, and ‘development or 
increase’, and also ‘conquering or 
getting over’).

{@--2@} To repeat a
letter (as in the {#krama#} arrangement).
